ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'

about.summary: Bias- and Uncertainty-Corrected Sample Size. BUCSS implements a method of correcting for publication bias and uncertainty when planning sample sizes in a future study from an original study. See Anderson, Kelley, & Maxwell (2017; Psychological Science, 28, 1547-1562).

Bias- and Uncertainty-Corrected Sample Size. BUCSS implements a method of correcting for publication bias and uncertainty when planning sample sizes in a future study from an original study. See Anderson, Kelley, & Maxwell (2017; Psychological Science, 28, 1547-1562).

name: r-bucss
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.2.1' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bucss
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/BUCSS_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/BUCSS/BUCSS_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b9333ea705e61d086d71996b8a34095247c372effd37df41733e915cfcedc0d9

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 4
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip  # [win]

  host:
    - r-base

  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('BUCSS')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('BUCSS')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=BUCSS
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: Bias- and Uncertainty-Corrected Sample Size. BUCSS implements a method of correcting
    for publication bias and uncertainty when planning sample sizes in a future study
    from an original study. See Anderson, Kelley, & Maxwell (2017; Psychological Science,
    28, 1547-1562).
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# The original CRAN metadata for this package was:

# Package: BUCSS
# Type: Package
# Title: Bias and Uncertainty Corrected Sample Size

# Maintainer: Ken Kelley <kkelley@nd.edu>
# Description: Bias- and Uncertainty-Corrected Sample Size. BUCSS implements a method of correcting for publication bias and uncertainty when planning sample sizes in a future study from an original study. See Anderson, Kelley, & Maxwell (2017; Psychological Science, 28, 1547-1562).
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Imports: stats
# LazyData: TRUE
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.1

# See
